// 音效
export function playSound(newRandomNumber){if(newRandomNumber<7){var audioPath="./audio/spvoice_".concat(newRandomNumber,".mp3");var audio=new Audio(audioPath);audio.play();}else{var noraudio=newRandomNumber-6;var _audioPath="./audio/norvoice_".concat(noraudio,".mp3");var _audio=new Audio(_audioPath);_audio.play();}}
